article.content:
table-of-contents ================= end-table-of-contents ===================== Organizing Committee -------------------- The GCC2013 Organizing Committee is responsible for event planning. The Organizing Committee can be reached at \[gcc2013 DASH org AT galaxyproject DOT org]\(mailto:gcc2013 DASH org AT galaxyproject DOT org). * **[Nils Damm Christophersen](http://www.mn.uio.no/ifi/english/people/aca/nilsch/index.html)** * [University of Oslo](http://www.uio.no/)

* **[Dave Clements](/people/dave-clements/)** * [Emory University](http://emory.edu/)

* **[Ingeborg Bjorvand Engh](http://www.mn.uio.no/ifi/english/people/aca/ingebbj/)** * [University of Oslo](http://www.uio.no/)

* **[Mohammad Heydarian](http://epigenetics.jhu.edu/?section=personnelPages\&personID=26)** * [Johns Hopkins University](http://jhu.edu/)

* **[Geir Kjetil Sandve](http://www.mn.uio.no/ifi/english/people/aca/geirksa/index.html)** * [University of Oslo](http://www.uio.no/) Scientific Committee -------------------- The GCC2013 Scientific Committee is responsible for reviewing [talk and poster abstract submissions](/events/gcc2013/abstracts/), selecting and inviting keynote speakers, and reviewing and selecting lightning talk proposals. The Scientific Committee can be reached at \[gcc2013 DASH sci AT galaxyproject DOT org]\(mailto:gcc2013 DASH sci AT galaxyproject DOT org). * **[Nils Damm Christophersen](http://www.mn.uio.no/ifi/english/people/aca/nilsch/index.html)** * [University of Oslo](http://www.uio.no/)

* **[Anton Nekrutenko](/people/anton/)** * [Penn State University](http://www.psu.edu)

* **[Karen Reddy](http://biolchem.bs.jhmi.edu/pages/facultydetail.aspx?FID=343)** * [Johns Hopkins University](http://jhu.edu/)

* **[Geir Kjetil Sandve](http://www.mn.uio.no/ifi/english/people/aca/geirksa/index.html)** * [University of Oslo](http://www.uio.no/)

* **[James Taylor](/people/james-taylor/)**, Committee Chair * [Emory University](http://emory.edu)
